nodes.text: She called for far-reaching reform across the Arab world not only in education but also to address growing deficits in freedom and women s empowerment.
Societies will not prosper if minds are stifled by flawed knowledge systems
Khalaf who has directed the UN s Arab Human Development Reports (AHDR) emphasised that reform needs to go well beyond the economic realm.
We should change the situation of flawed knowledge system
The best means to do that is to reform the education the freedoms and teh women's conditions
